item.title: Bandung Golf Package (4D3N)
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: BANDUNG GOLF PACKAGE (4D3N) Bandung Golf Package for play at Golf Courses around Bandung. Bandung Indah Golf Club, Dago Endah Golf Club, Mountain View Golf Club, Bandung Giri Gahana. Tour Category: (4 Days 3 Nights) Tour Type Available: 6 seater van 12 seater ELF Start in: Bandung Finish in: Bandung Pick up/Drop off point : Bandung PRICE 6 seater van 2.659.167 IDR/pax (About 723 MYR/267SGD/202USD) 12 Seater ELF 2.757.00 IDR/pax (About 749 MYR/277 SGD/209USD) *Please consider surcharge for highseason, longweekend. Tour Description : Day 1 Arrival in Bandung. Upon arrival in Husein Sastra Negara Bandung Airport,you will be meet and greet by our representative and we will transfer you to hotel for check in and free at your own leisure Day 2 Golf Club Breakfast at hotel. After finish your breakfast, assemble at lobby and we will transfer you to One of Bandung Golf Club in Bandung for your tee at the golf course. After finish your golfing, we will transfer you back to hotel and free at your own leisure. Day 3 Golf Club Breakfast at hotel. After finish your breakfast, assemble at lobby and we will transfer you to One of Bandung Golf Club in Bandung for your tee at the golf course. After finish your golfing, we will transfer you back to hotel and free at your own leisure. Day 4 Departure Breakfast at hotel.After breakfast free at your own leisure until you will be transfer to airport for your flight departure back to your next destination. This tour Include: Exclude Private transport by AC minibus/car All listed activities Room at 3 stars hotel Guests Meals For further information please contact us :

item.title: Bandung Sight Seeing 1(one) Day Tour Package
item.dc:creator: root
item.content:encoded: BANDUNG SIGHT SEEING 1 (One ) DAY TOUR PACKAGE Discover the unique of Bandung in One Day with our Bandung sightseeing Tour Package program Tour Category: One-Day Tour Tour Duration: 9: 00 AM 9:00 PM Tour Type Available: 6 seater van 12 seater ELF Start in: Bandung Finish in: Bandung Tour Code : BSG001 Pick up/Drop off point : at your hotel PRICE 6 seater van 168.334 IDR/pax (About 45 MYR/16SGD/13USD) 12 Seater ELF 185.834 IDR/pax (About 50 MYR/18 SGD/14USD) *additional IDR 100.000/pax for Lunch (about 27 MYR/10 SGD/8USD) additional IDR 100.000/pax for Dinner (about 27 MYR/10 SGD/8USD) if you want us to arrange for meals Tour Description : Visit any interesting places in Bandung downtown like Gedung Sate, Factory Outlets Areas (in Jalan Dago, Jalan Riau, Jalan Setiabudi), Bandung Shopping Malls, the Groote Postweg, Geological Museum, Bandung Uniques market (like Cibadyut leather industy center, Cihampelas for Jeans Street, Palasari as specialized market for Books, Pasar Baru as a clothing market, Jalan Surapati specialized for T-Shirt industrial area). Historical building places This tour Include: This tour Exclude: Private transport by AC minibus/car All listed activities Any entrance Ticket Guest meals (Lunch Dinner) For further information please contact us :
